      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static com.google.common.base.Joiner blankJoiner
      空白连接器，忽略null JoinerUtils.blankJoiner.join("a", "b", "c"); result : abc JoinerUtils.blankJoiner.join("a", null, "c"); result : ac
      static com.google.common.base.Joiner blankJoinerWithNull
      空白连接器 JoinerUtils.blankJoinerWithNull.join("a", "b", "c"); result : abc JoinerUtils.blankJoinerWithNull.join("a", null, "c"); result : anullc

      逗号分隔符连接器，忽略null JoinerUtils.commaJoiner.join("a", "b", "c"); result : a,b,c JoinerUtils.commaJoiner.join("a", null, "c"); result : a,c

      逗号分隔符连接器 JoinerUtils.commaJoinerWithNull.join("a", "b", "c"); result : a,b,c JoinerUtils.commaJoinerWithNull.join("a", null, "c"); result : a,null,c

      等号分隔符连接器，忽略null JoinerUtils.equalJoiner.join("a", "b", "c"); result : a=b=c JoinerUtils.equalJoiner.join("a", null, "c"); result : a=c
